## NurbsCurve.Evaluate method

评估 NURBS 曲线

```csharp
public Vector4[] Evaluate(int steps = 20)
```

| 范围 | 类型 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| steps | Int32 | 两个邻居之间的评估频率节，默认值为 20 |
